name: Beat It! (DobleC)
description:
Beat It! is a game that I have developed with Kiwi Team.

It's a mix between a rhythm game in the style of Rhythm Paradise and a Simon Says designed to be played on smartphones.

The mechanics are simple, Bea T. is surrounded by a huge group of monsters,
but instead of giving up, he decides to use the ancient art of the punch-knee-kick-headbutt, a fighting style taught to him by his grandfather.
Thus, you must face the endless waves of monsters while pressing
at the right moment the combat action that appears on the screen.
